entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and afternoon. Flurries at times heavy beginning late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending after midnight then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
